TestCaseDescription: If Principal has a Canada Branch FRFI then “Entity is Multibranch” in basic information should be set to true
Principal is a Covered Entity should be true if Principal is a member of a Canada AANA Group is true
Confirmation of expected display and functionality of  section Self Disclosure -Contact Information at SD screen
Under 2016 Canada AANA Threshold if “Not above CAD $5 trillion Canada AANA” is check then one option under Canada AANA Threshold Estimate should be check
Under 2016 Canada AANA Threshold if “Above CAD $5 trillion Canada AANA” is check then under Canada AANA Threshold Estimate “None of the above” should be check

If under 2016 Canada AANA Threshold if either “Canada AANA information will be separately reported by Principal’s Canada Ultimate Parent” or “Canada AANA information will be separately reported by the following person:” are check then under Canada AANA Threshold Estimate “Decline to answer” should be check
Confirm the display of correct fields and information for Canada relevant Regulatory jurisdiction on self disclosure screen.
